track.name: Annihilate (Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse) (Metro Boomin & Swae Lee, Lil Wayne, Offset)

album.title: METRO BOOMIN PRESENTS SPIDER-MAN: ACROSS THE SPIDER-VERSE (SOUNDTRACK FROM AND INSPIRED BY THE MOTION PICTURE)

wiki.summary: “Annihilate” serves as the introduction to the Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse soundtrack. On it, household rap names Lil Wayne, Offset, and Swae Lee put on the spider-mask, and specifically speak about the heroic aspects of taking on the role of Spider-Man. A snippet of the song would surface online as Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse began premiering, shortly before it’s release. “Annihilate” marks the second collaboration between Swae Lee and Offset, following their song “Gargoyle” with Rich The Kid. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Annihilate” serves as the introduction to the Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse soundtrack. On it, household rap names Lil Wayne, Offset, and Swae Lee put on the spider-mask, and specifically speak about the heroic aspects of taking on the role of Spider-Man. A snippet of the song would surface online as Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse began premiering, shortly before it’s release. “Annihilate” marks the second collaboration between Swae Lee and Offset, following their song “Gargoyle” with Rich The Kid. “Annihilate” marks Lil Wayne’s first collaboration with both Swae and Offset.
